If you'll reach [your State Pension age](/state-pension-age) in more than 30 days, call the [Future Pension Centre](/future-pension-centre) and ask for a statement.

You can also fill in the [BR19 application form](/government/publications/application-for-a-state-pension-statement) and send it in the post. 

You'll get your statement within 10 working days.
 
##If you're already getting your State Pension or have delayed claiming it

To get information about your State Pension, contact the [Pension Service](/contact-pension-service) if you're in the UK or the [International Pension Centre](/international-pension-centre) if you live abroad.

introduction:
Use this service to find out:

- how much State Pension you could get (this amount is also known as your State Pension forecast)
- when you can get it
- how to increase it, if you can

^This page is also available in Welsh ([Cymraeg](/gwirio-eich-pensiwn-y-wladwriaeth)).^

[The State Pension age is under review](/government/news/proposed-new-timetable-for-state-pension-age-increases) and may change in the future.

^You can't use this service if you're already getting your State Pension or if you've delayed ('deferred') claiming it.^
overview: Find out how much State Pension you could get, when you could get it and how you could increase it
title: Check your State Pension
